coreAttributes.name: platform boot
coreAttributes.description: A pair of platform boots, with the heel being significantly raised off the ground in order to make the wearer taller, as well as to accentuate their calf muscles and the overall length of their legs.

replacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(slip)] [npc.her] [npc.feet] into the platform boots and [npc.verb(zip)] up the sides.
replacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(slip)] [npc2.namePos] [npc2.feet] into the platform boots and [npc.verb(zip)] up the sides.
replacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] roughly [npc.verb(push)] [npc2.namePos] [npc2.feet] into the platform boots and [npc.verb(zip)] up the sides.

displacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] roughly [npc.verb(unzip)] [npc2.namePos] platform boots and [npc.verb(yank)] them off.
